ControlBlock.Description: Switch between In1 and In3 dependent on Switch signal: Switch signal rising: Switch >= Threshold up --> Out = In1 Switch signal falling: Switch < Threshold down --> Out = In3

ControlBlock.Description: BEMFalpha=Va-Rs0*Ia-Ls0*deltaIa BEMFbeta=Vb-Rs0*Ib-Ls0*deltaIb FIP: Rs0 = Rs*(I0/U0) Ls0 = Ls*(I0/U0) Float: Rs0 = Rs Ls0 = Ls

MaskInport.Name: Valpha
MaskInport.Description: Clarke transformed Output A phase voltage

MaskInport.Name: Vbeta
MaskInport.Description: Clarke transformed Output B phase voltage

MaskParameter.Name: Ls
MaskParameter.Description: Motor phase inductance for Y connection (MilliHenry)

MaskParameter.Name: Rs
MaskParameter.Description: Motor phase resistance for Y connection (Ohm)

MaskParameter.Name: U0
MaskParameter.Prompt: U0: DC link voltage (Only in Fip implementation)
MaskParameter.Description: U0: DC link voltage (Only in Fip implementation)

MaskParameter.Name: I0
MaskParameter.Prompt: I0: maximum peak current (Only in Fip implementation)
MaskParameter.Description: The maximum peak current per phase (Only in Fip implementation)

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

MaskParameter.Name: CurrentSampleFactor
MaskParameter.Prompt: Current Sample Factor (1 and bigger integers)
MaskParameter.Description: Division factor for current sample. (in integer format) Current sample = ModelSampleTime/CurrentSampleFactor

ScriptDefineSection.Item: myStyle = myStyle + "verticalAlign=bottom;" // place to the bottom
myStyle = myStyle + "fontSize=14;" // Text little bit bigger

ImplementationParameter.Name: Ls
ImplementationParameter.Description: Motor phase inductance. Scales by I0/U0

ImplementationParameter.Name: Rs
ImplementationParameter.Description: Motor phase resistance. Scales by I0/U0.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Ib_old
ImplementationParameter.Description: Input value from previous cycle. Sample time divided by CurrentSampleFactor

ImplementationParameter.Name: Ia_old
ImplementationParameter.Description: Input value from previous cycle. Sample time divided by CurrentSampleFactor

ImplementationParameter.Name: CurrentSampleFactor
ImplementationParameter.Description: Division factor for current sample. Current sample: ModelSampleTime/CurrentSampleFactor

ControlBlock.Description: Merged Clark and park transform. d=a*cos(theta)+((a*2b)*1.732)*sin(theta) q=-a*sin(theta)+((a*2b)*1.732)*cos(theta) Moves a three-axis, two-dimensional coordinate system, referenced to the stator, onto a two-axis system, keeping the same reference. The two-axis orthogonal system with the axis called alpha-beta transform into another two-axis system that is rotating with the rotor flux. Two-axis rotating coordinate system is called the d-q axis. Theta represents the rotor angle.

ControlBlock.Description: Merged Inverse Park, Iverse Clark and Space Vector Modulation Park_inv: alpha = d*cos(theta) - q*sin(theta) beta = d*sin(theta) + q*cos(theta) Clark_inv: a = beta b = (-beta + 1.732*alpha)/2 c = (-beta - 1.732*alpha)/2 SVM: Optimize output for PWM Description: Transform from the two-axis rotating d-q frame to the two-axis stationary frame -. Transform from the stationary two-axis - frame to the stationary three-axis, 3-phase reference frame. Optimize output for PWM ForcedMode [boolean] -> if enabled, then the theta input overwritten with 0 position and iq with forcedValue

MaskInport.Name: d
MaskInport.Description: d voltage axis in rotating system

MaskInport.Name: q
MaskInport.Description: q voltage axis in rotating system

MaskInport.Name: forcedMode
MaskInport.Description: Force Motor to base position. 0 -> No force. Normal mode. 1 -> Force the motor to base position.

ControlBlock.Description: Limitation of rising and falling rate. Function of Enable: 0: rate limiting disabled, signal is passed through 1: rate limiting enabled, signal is rate limited 0->1: preload of output with value from init input

MaskInport.Name: Init
MaskInport.Description: Value which is loaded at rising flanke of enable signal.

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable == 0: Deactivation of block; Out is set to In. Enable != 0: Activation of block; Out is rate limited. Enable 0->1: Preloading of output; Out is set to value of Init input.

MaskParameter.Name: Tr
MaskParameter.Description: Rising time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tr.

MaskParameter.Name: Tf
MaskParameter.Description: Falling time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tf.

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ImplementationParameter.Name: out_old
ImplementationParameter.Description: Output value from last cycle in int32 format.

ImplementationParameter.Name: out_old
ImplementationParameter.Description: Output value from last cycle in int32 format.

ControlBlock.Description: Limitation of rising and falling rate. Function of Enable: 0: rate limiting disabled, signal is passed through 1: rate limiting enabled, signal is rate limited 0->1: preload of output with value from init input

MaskInport.Name: Init
MaskInport.Description: Value which is loaded at rising flanke of enable signal.

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable == 0: Deactivation of block; Out is set to In. Enable != 0: Activation of block; Out is rate limited. Enable 0->1: Preloading of output; Out is set to value of Init input.

MaskParameter.Name: Tr
MaskParameter.Description: Rising time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tr.

MaskParameter.Name: Tf
MaskParameter.Description: Falling time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tf.

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ImplementationParameter.Name: out_old
ImplementationParameter.Description: Output value from last cycle in int32 format.

ImplementationParameter.Name: out_old
ImplementationParameter.Description: Output value from last cycle in int32 format.

ControlBlock.Description: Limitation of rising and falling rate. Function of Enable: 0: rate limiting disabled, signal is passed through 1: rate limiting enabled, signal is rate limited 0->1: preload of output with value from init input

MaskInport.Name: Init
MaskInport.Description: Value which is loaded at rising flanke of enable signal.

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable == 0: Deactivation of block; Out is set to In. Enable != 0: Activation of block; Out is rate limited. Enable 0->1: Preloading of output; Out is set to value of Init input.

MaskParameter.Name: Tr
MaskParameter.Description: Rising time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tr.

MaskParameter.Name: Tf
MaskParameter.Description: Falling time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tf.

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ImplementationParameter.Name: out_old
ImplementationParameter.Description: Output value from last cycle in int32 format.

ImplementationParameter.Name: out_old
ImplementationParameter.Description: Output value from last cycle in int32 format.
